name: Wedecode (Fast)
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p workspaces uploads output && pnpm install --shamefully-hoist && pnpm rebuild && echo '✅ 环境设置完成！正在启动开发服务器...'
postStartCommand: echo '🔨 Building project...' && pnpm run build && echo '🚀 Starting UI server...' && pnpm run ui || echo '❌ Failed to start UI server. You can manually run: pnpm run ui'
